entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
